main.name: Bo Liu
main.description: Interested in software development. Dedicated to solving the real-world problem using the software programming. Proficient in Python, Java, C, JS, etc. Have made several desktops, mobile and web apps.
main.bio: A fourth-year computer science and statistic student studying at the University of Toronto. Interested in software development. Dedicated to solving the real-world problem using the software programming. Proficient in Python, Java, JS, etc. Have made several desktops, mobile and web apps.

education.degree: Post Graduate Certificate - Major in Cloud Computing
Honor Bachelor of Science double majored in Statistics and Neuroscience

work.title: Software Develper (Capstone Project)
work.description: Designed, constructed, modified and tested KnowQuest frontend using ReactJS, CSS3/SCSS and bootstrap.Implemented backend and administration platform using Python Django framework. Implemented application virtualization using Docker and Docker Compose, draft Dockerfile for development and production environment.Designed AWS cloud deployment solution, and deployed frontend and backend using AWS ECS; deployed PostgreSQL using AWS RDS; constructed load balancers and target groups; constructed AWS S3 for static file storage; constructed CloudFront for static contents caching.

work.title: Software Develper
work.description: Designed, constructed, modified, integrated, and tested data models and database management systems (MySQL and Python) for: Sales data ($100K per month); Client inquires data (50+ inquiries per day); Website and WeChat Mini Program visitor data (500+ active visitors per day).Operated database management systems (MySQL and Python) to analyze data and using machine learning algorithms for data mining.Modified, optimized, and implemented webpage, WeChat Mini Program, and advertisement contents on 100+ Ads display kiosks contents using HTML, bootstrap and ReactJS based on database and customer behavior.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Implemented the UI and administration platform of core features with Html5 and ReactJS; Updated the styles of the UI and administration platform using CSS3/SCSS and bootstrap; Implemented the design of token transaction tool through Klaytn blockchain network.

projects.title: Design a highly scalable and highly avaibele website
